name: Sabre Shark
text:
2 Level 5 Fish monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card using a Rank 4 "Shark" monster you control. All WATER Monsters you control gain 300 ATK. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Special Summon 1 WATER Xyz monster from your GY. If a WATER Xyz monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can attach 1 card they control to that card as an Xyz Material. You can only use each effect of "Sabre Shark" once per turn.
